question.en: This application requires you to read text to answer questions. Do you have any vision-related requirements we can assist with?
Yes, I would like to use some of the accessibility features of the app

name.en: I would like to change the font size
I would like to change the font color (high contrast mode)
I would like to use a screen reader
I would like a person to read the text to me

question.en: This application may present some sound files for you to listen to. Do you have any hearing-related requirements we can assist with?
Yes, I would like to use some of the accessibility features of the app

name.en: I would like to turn up the volume
I would like to turn on closed captions
I would like to use haptic feedback (vibrations) instead of audio cues

question.en: This application requires you to navigate through the questions using a touch screen. Do you have any physical challenges we can accommodate?
Yes, I would like to use some of the accessibility features of the app

name.en: I would like to increase the size of the buttons
I have an alternative keyboard I'd like to connect instead
I would like to navigate the survey using voice commands instead of the touch screen

question.en: This application requires you to read text, answer questions, and follow directions. Do you have any cognitive challenges, including difficulty reading, that we can assist with?
Yes, I would like to use some of the accessibility features of the app

name.en: I would like the questions to be read to me using text-to-speech
I would like a person to read the text to me
I would like to speak my answers instead of typing them

question.en: If primary language is "other", please specify:
Do you speak any additional language(s) fluently (similar to a native speaker)?
If you speak any other languages fluently, please specify:
What is your date of birth?
(Check all that apply if you currently have the condition)
Lesions of the vocal cord (nodule, polyp, cyst)
Alzheimer's, Dementia, or Mild Cognitive Impairment
Airway Stenosis (for example: bilateral vocal fold paralysis; laryngeal stenosis)
How did you learn about this study?

[DEPRECATED] I want my contact information to be kept in a repository for this study which can be used to contact me to ask me to enroll in further studies or return important results. My information will not be shared with third parties.
Please review your answers reading all the way through the bottom and select an option. If you have any questions, you can still proceed with enrollment and ask or make changes at a later time.

name.en: I have a confirmed clinical diagnosis and proof of a disorder that qualifies me to participate in this study.
I will need to have a video camera turned on during any interactions with the research team.

question.en: Please select a reason for declining

name.en: I am not interested in having my voice recorded
I do not have enough time today and want to be contacted later
I do not have enough time and do not want to be contacted later
I prefer not to share any health information for research

question.en: If "Other" reason for declining enrollment, please specify:
